results.title: Correlated increase of omentin-1 and adiponectin by exenatide, avandamet and dietary change in diet-induced obese rats.
results.text_hl: It is known that insulin sensitizers @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@exenatide@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_rosiglitazone_metformin_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C471074 @@@avandamet@@@, or diet change from high-fat to normal chow ameliorate @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorders@@@.

Correlated increase of omentin-1 and adiponectin by exenatide, avandamet and dietary change in diet-induced obese rats. Folia Biol (Praha). 2013;59(6):217-24. PMID: 24485303
